imdb.plot outline: Easy to make recipes for the average home chef to the experienced restaurant chef. From new recipes to new takes on some old classics, from vegetarian to gluten free, from meat lovers to foodies, the Kooky Chef does it all. From grilling to frying, whether it's a weeknight dinner, or a party, you're sure to find something on The Kooky Chef Menu.
imdb.title: The Kooky Chef Menu
